      • showError

        public void showError(java.lang.String errorTitle,
                      java.lang.String errorMsg,
                      boolean closeApp)
        Open a Javafx error window that will block other windows until accepted
        Parameters:
        errorTitle - String corresponding to title of the error window
        errorMsg - String corresponding to the error message shown on the window
        closeApp - boolean if true, this error may close the app, otherwise do nothing

        Parameters:

        boolean to indicate whether user has accepted or rejected the confirmation
